root.name: Tokushu Hodobu
root.description: OverviewTokushu Hodobu is an adventure game/visual novel about a television production crew that produces a TV show covering UFO sightings, aliens, ghosts and other paranormal activity. It features greater interactivity than the usual visual novel, as the player is tasked with investigating incidents in the field by interviewing witnesses, taking photos and such, and then selecting what to feature on the broadcasted TV program.The game was developed by Nippon Ichi Software as a 20th anniversary project.
